name: CasparCMS
tagline: The first real CMS for CasparCG
body:
### Welcome to CasparCMG
Currently the website is still in development and will progress over time. Our current main goal is to make the current Caspar flow a lot easier to understand and to customize. No more problems with complicated scripts to call in CasparCG assets. Just drag in your files and start playing.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
